text: This place deserves more reviews! Dropped by this place with my wife. The food was delicious! We ordered the Saturday special, which was 2 plates of Beef Sharwarma. I'm just glad that we didn't settle for the pizza place across the street but instead decided to try this gem out!

The chicken on the rocks here are very good and will save you the huge lineup across tha rd :). The owner was very propper at making sure everything was perfect.will try other dishes in the future .
Chicken on the rocks btw

Great shawarma place, reasonable prices and the best funnel cake in the city, for only $5! Beef, lamb and chicken shawarma are all great options. Owner is great guy to talk to, very nice! Defiantly my new spot!
